metadata.title: CVE-2017-8812 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.27.4, 1.28.x before 1.28.3, and 1.29.x before 1.29.2allows remote attackers to inject > (greater than) characters via the idattribute of a headline.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
